title: New: Emma McGrath – Love You Better
body:
Despite only being eighteen, there’s a real maturity to the songwriting from North London’s **Emma McGrath**, hence it coming as little surprise to know that she’s been writing her own material since she was twelve years old.

Latest single, _Love You Better_, isn’t a million miles from Fleetwood Mac, or the HAIM sisters, in it’s knack for picking out a killer hook and making it thrillingly addictive, whilst still proving pretty hard hitting lyrically – ‘I’ll be fine / either way / I won’t use my heart / to make you stay’. Check it out below.
